name: Cave Cropduster
description:
Harvest mushrooms with your cropduster

But first you may have to spray them with pesticide or fertilizer

Instructions

Navigate the tunnels, upgrade your aircraft and get rich by harvesting mushrooms.

Controls

- WS = Pitch

- A + D = Throttle

- Space = Spray

Tips

- Unlock the fertilizer for 5$

- You get 1$ for small mushrooms, 5$ for fertilized. -2$ for infected
